column4: ok, for whatever reason when i put in my password the screen goes black, then i get dumped back into the login screen. only way for me to get a desktop is to log in as a guest user...and i can't seem to get su to let me change to my own username :(
h crap, and now i can't get gnome-terminal out of fullscreen mode D:
fffffffffffff unity makes no sense D:
you've probably broken some of your gui config files. can you login to a tty? ctrl-alt-f1
